title: Yesterdays with authors.
author: Fields, James Thomas
snippet: When she talked of Munden and Bannister and Fawcett and Emery, those delightful old actors for whom she had had such an exquisite relish, she said they had made comedy to her a living art full of laughter and tears.

title: Yesterdays with authors.
author: Fields, James Thomas
snippet: potent crazes, and I fully believe, if she had been alive daring the days of his downfall, she would have died of grief When she talked of Munden and Bannister and Fawcett and Emery, those delightful old actors for wdiom she had had such an exquisite relish, she said they had made comedy to her a living art full of laughter and tears.
